title: UPMC fungal infections caused by inhaled mold spores, investigators believe
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Health - Today 
The four UPMC transplant patients who contracted fungal infections over the last year got them from breathing in mold spores, not from somet... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
